entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
